item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with props and hats. Have lots of fun and insight about your personality and those important to you. Herb provides the vegetarian dinner though by all mean bring vegetarian food, appetizers, drinks or desserts as an option. Dinner 7-8pm, though food available all evening. Workshop 8-10pm. Socialize afterwards.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a therapist, personal life coach and workshop leader, trainer in organizations. He has been practicing 30 years and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and soon to be "Herb's Tips for Living."

www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com,
781 648 3737

7:00-10pm

$40, sliding scale to $20
item.name: Singles Enneagram Dinner Workshop and Party
